description.S1: Grace doesn't know where Zoe might have gone.
description.S2: She suggested checking the shack where Zoe beds down for any hints at where she might have gone.

blurb.B1: Speaking with Stefan Garcia will not give any clues to Zoe's whereabouts.
blurb.B2: However, Stefan will reveal that he and Zoe used to watch the serial, The Masked Marketeer, together
blurb.B3: and that he was planning to surprise her with a genuine copy of the latest episode before she went missing.
blurb.B4: He will also allude to her habit of writing things down on pieces of paper ("journaling"),
blurb.B5: which he considers a bit odd.
blurb.B6: Zoe's house is located in the southeast of the botanical labs.
blurb.B7: Pages from her journal can be found inside and Page 22 will reveal that Zoe left the camp to join the marauders and become a bandit queen.

dialog.speaker: StefanGarcia (Male)
dialog.utterance: You hungry? We got canid ribs. Canid flank. Canid snout, too.

dialog.speaker: StefanGarcia (Male)
dialog.utterance: Something I can help you with?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I'm told one of your number's gone missing.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: What are you selling?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: See you around.

dialog.speaker: StefanGarcia (Male)
dialog.utterance: You mean Zoe? Yeah, we were pretty close. Not like her to go loping off.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: What was that about surprising Zoe?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: What happened on the day Zoe disappeared?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Tell me a little about Zoe.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Was she acting strange before she disappeared?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Hold on. There was something else.

dialog.speaker: StefanGarcia (Male)
dialog.utterance: The other day I got my hands on a genuine copy of the latest Masked Marketeer. I was gonna surprise Zoe with it, but she was gone the next day.

dialog.speaker: StefanGarcia (Male)
dialog.utterance: Zoe and I were gonna watch the serials, as is our custom. She never turned up. I looked around, but she was nowhere to be found.

dialog.speaker: StefanGarcia (Male)
dialog.utterance: You sound like some type of corporate fixer, asking all these questions.

dialog.speaker: StefanGarcia (Male)
dialog.utterance: Zoe was always obsessed with this serial. Masked Marketeer. A scion of Byzantium turns to banditry, and teaches his marauder companions the wisdom of free market economics.

dialog.speaker: StefanGarcia (Male)
dialog.utterance: Shame she up and vanished when she did. I had a surprise lined up for her.

dialog.speaker: StefanGarcia (Male)
dialog.utterance: Can't say I recall Zoe ever acting strange. Well, except for her habit of writing things down on scraps of paper.

dialog.speaker: StefanGarcia (Male)
dialog.utterance: She called it "journaling," but I think it's just plain odd.

dialog.speaker: StefanGarcia (Male)
dialog.utterance: Hey, I got time.

dialog.speaker: StefanGarcia (Male)
dialog.utterance: Fresh off the limb! And that includes canid meat.
